headline.main: CITY GOVERNMENT.; THE BOARD OF ALDERMEN. DETECTION OF INCENDIARIES THE GREAT EASTERN TO VISIT NEW-YORK THE CHARACTER OF THE FLOATING DEBT OF THE CITY TO BE CHANGED $15,000 FOR NEW GAS BURNERS.

docs.lead_paragraph: At the meeting of the Board of Aldermen last evening, a resolution was adopted directing the Mayor to offer a reward of $2,500 for the detection of the party who set fire to the tenement house No. 96 Fortyfifth street, by which eleven persons lost their lives.

docs.snippet: BAPTIST MARINERS' SOCIETY. The earliest of the May anniversaries was held last evening in Dr. GILLETTE'S church, known as Calvary Church, in Twenty-third street, it being the third annual celebration of the American Baptist Mariners' Society. The...

headline.main: THE THIRD ANNIVERSARY OF THE AMERICAN.

docs.lead_paragraph: BAPTIST MARINERS' SOCIETY. The earliest of the May anniversaries was held last evening in Dr. GILLETTE'S church, known as Calvary Church, in Twenty-third street, it being the third annual celebration of the American Baptist Mariners' Society. The audience was quite small, not more than one hundred persons being present.

headline.main: CHARLESTON CONVENTIONS; PROGRESS OF THE FACTIONS. THE BALLOTINGS. THE PLATFORM OF THE SECEDERS. Probabilities of an Adjournment to Baltimore, Action of the Wood Delegation. THE NATIONAL CONVENTION. CLOSE OF TUESDAY'S PROCEEDINGS. PROCEEDINGS YESTERDAY. CHARLESTON, Wednesday, May 2. THE SOUTHERN CONVENTION TUESDAY'S PROCEEDINGS. THE PROCEEDINGS YESTERDAY. Mayor Wood Among the Editors.

docs.lead_paragraph: GILMORE'S Brass Band made every one homesick this mornning, at the opening of the Convention, by playing "Home, Sweet Home." Mr. FLOURNOY, of Arkansas, after it had got through, jumped upon a chair and called at the top of his voice for three cheers for the Union. All present, ladies included, responded heartily. Then our drooping spirits were revived by "Hail Columbia" and "Yankee Doodle."

docs.snippet: The following letter was written by HENRY CLAY, immediately after the adjournment of the Philadelphia Convention, in 1848. It is now first published from the original in our possession.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Canada, from Liverpool on the 21st ult., with Queenstown advices by telegraph to the 22d, arrived at Halifax last evening. Among other matters thus received, we learn that no decision had been rendered by DOWLING, the referee in the late contest for the Championship; but that in answer to the statement of that person, to the effect that the Americans had interposed and con strained him to terminate the fight, GEO. headline.main: CITY INTELLIGENCE.; DR. CHEEVER'S DIFFICULTIES. Another Heated Discussion--The Question Still Undecided.

docs.lead_paragraph: The debate which has had its origin in the difficulties engendered between Dr. CHEEVER and his friends, on one hand, ad the Trustees of the Church of which he is the pastor, on the other, was continued last evening, pursuant to adjournment. The lecture room of the Church was Crowded.
